alert.note: Alert for Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 1:13AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Surry and central Yadkin Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 112 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yadkinville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rainfall could result in flooding of low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water on roadways is likely in areas of heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Fairview... Yadkinville... Dobson... Boonville... Nebo... Level Cross... and Rockford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
